original_title: A Game of Three Halves: Where the F%*ck Is Hamish?
overview: Guts and glory are at stake in the Saturday recreational soccer league. This hilarious animation perfectly captures the highs and lows of coaxing together a motley crew to show up on time and game ready every week, but at the end of the day it's all worth it for the beautiful game.
tagline: My life organizing Sunday league football.
title: A Game of Three Halves: Where the F%*ck Is Hamish?
